title: BnbSteps
author: BnbSteps
content: BNBSTEPS BOUNTY CAMPAIGNBNBSTEPS is the first APP where you exchange your steps for BNB!More details on the website: https://bnbsteps.space/● Bounty Campaign Duration: November 19 - December 24 lasts for 5 weeks● Tokens are distributed to participants on a weekly basis● Join BNBSTEPS on social media:- Telegram- Twitter- Facebook- Instagram- TikTok● You will receive weekly stakes for performing certain actions, the stakes will be converted into tokens, according to the formula (total number of tokens/total number of stakes)*number of your stakes● Use of multi-accounts, spam, bots and other is strictly forbidden, all attempts will be bannedFormat for proof of authentication post:Code:Proof of authentication:- Telegram Username:- Campaigns applied for:Bounty campaign reward pool: 50 000 000 SSP will be distributed through this bounty campaign Rewards dislocation:● Video:  25%● Medium: 10%● Twitter : 20%● Telegram: 15%● Facebook: 15%● Instagram: 15%VIDEO CAMPAIGNRewards:● Excellent: 4 stakes● High: 3 stakes● Good: 2 stake● Average: 1 stake● Each participant can send:                                            - YouTube - 10 videos ( No more than 1 video per day )                                            - Tiktok - 10 videos ( No more than 1 video per day )● YouTube videos must be useful, informative and the video description must include 30+ words of original text about the BNBSTEPS● A video for a TikTok should be creative, interesting, and tiktok style. Long video reviews on the TikTok will not be judged!● Content topics: - Information can be used from social networks: BNBSTEPS Websiteand use hashtags: #freenft #freenftmint #crypto #blockchain #airdrop #cryptocurrency #cryptoaidrop #bsc● Only original video content will be accepted. Copy from others' work will be rejected● Face cam video will be highly recommended and considered● High engagements but poor quality video will not be rewarded. Stakes will be awarded based on the number of engagements and quality● Videos should never be removed. Removal/deletion will result in disqualification● All videos need to have a link to the Proof of Authentication, Project website, Twitter page, Telegram group, Your referral link ● By joining this program, all participants accept that the project's team can use all these videos as marketing materialsHow to join:  1. Join BNBSTEPS on social media:- Telegram- Twitter- Facebook- Instagram- TikTok2. Fill out the form:https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSdupCuGNhSBhFL872b3y_M805yA5roDow8cD1AMgLwtapk1sA/viewformARTICLE CAMPAIGNRewards:● Original article: 5 - 10 stakes, per participant in the campaign: Once every 3 days - max 2 articles per week ( 10 per campaign )Rules:● Create about BNBSTEPS article in your blog. You can use social media for simplicity:- Telegram- Twitter- Facebook- Instagram- TikTokHow to join:  1. Join BNBSTEPS on social media:- Telegram- Twitter- Facebook- Instagram- TikTok2. Fill out the form:https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSe2Gxk3e_BOt3SuBOqAHQOLrzg8DCGgqf8vZJyviXq6ZiaqPg/viewformTWITTER CAMPAIGNRewards:● 50 - 500 readers: 1 stake, per one tweet or retweet● 501 - 1000 readers: 2 stakes, per one tweet or retweet● 1001 - 3000 readers: 3 stakes, per one tweet or retweet● 3001 - 5000 readers: 4 stakes per one tweet or retweet● 5001+ readers: 5 stakes per one tweet or retweetRules:● Must have at least 50 followers and make privacy settings open for your page● Follow and like the official BNBSTEPS Twitter account● Make 1 post every day. Use information from official social networks. Your posts should have hashtags: #freenft #freenftmint #crypto #blockchain #airdrop #cryptocurrency #cryptoaidrop #bsc● Make 1 repost every day. Like a post when you make a repost. Use information from official social networks. Your posts should have hashtags: #freenft #freenftmint #crypto #blockchain #airdrop #cryptocurrency #cryptoaidrop #bsc● DO NOT SPAM IN THE OFFICIAL PAGES OF THE PROJECT !● Multiple accounts registrations are not allowed, all related accounts will be checked and deleted● Please, post all the links to your work in this thread every day or every 3 days as a new post. Do not quote or edit your previous reportHow to join:  1. Join BNBSTEPS on social media:- Telegram- Twitter- Facebook- Instagram- TikTok2. Fill out the form:https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSdsYF7NJELvTNNYqySEBPgMBMetpGUYPVOwAN8bVie5KoiJMA/viewformFACEBOOK CAMPAIGNRewards:● 50 - 100 Friends + Followers: 1 stake, per one post or repost or comment● 101 - 500 Friends + Followers: 2 stakes, per one post or repost or comment● 501 - 1000 Friends + Followers: 3 stakes, per one post or repost or comment● 1001 - 5000 Friends + Followers: 4 stakes per one post or repost or comment● 5001+ Followers: 5 stakes per one post or repost or commentRules:● Must have at least 50 friends and make privacy settings open for your page● Follow and like the official Facebook page● Make 1 post and 1 repost per day● Like a post when you make a share● Post must contain text 70+ characters, and hashtag: #freenft #freenftmint #crypto #blockchain #airdrop #cryptocurrency #cryptoaidrop #bsc● Multiple accounts registrations are not allowed, all related accounts will be checked and deleted● Please, post all the links to your work in this thread every day or every 3 days as a new post. Do not quote or edit your previous reportHow to join:  1. Join BNBSTEPS on social media:- Telegram- Twitter- Facebook- Instagram- TikTok2. Fill out the form:https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLScuTLy3WRfCYSQHpZTT_-4HX3uWPfLuaxnbZ7vSo2FQIBoqSA/viewformTELEGRAM CAMPAIGNRewards:● 1 comment = 1 stakes● 20 stakes for setting name (one time stake)Rules:● Make a maximum 5 comments per 1 day● DO NOT SPAM IN THE OFFICIAL PAGES OF THE PROJECT !● Write comments in a crypto related group, mentioning BNBSTEPSComment examples:- Did you hear about the BNBSTEPS?- Is the BNBSTEPS good for buying now??- Guys, what do you think about the BNBSTEPS?- BNBSTEPS looks good now, it's not pumped yet!           etc...● Multiple accounts registrations are not allowed, all related accounts will be checked and deleted.Name: Your name | BNBSTEPS AmbassadorHow to join:  1. Join BNBSTEPS on social media:- Telegram- Twitter- Facebook- Instagram- TikTok2. Fill out the form:https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSdvX8n5UFb2pGOa1pgB8hqcexOQdoQYtXNQ7GAD4BPDcp7urg/viewformINSTAGRAM CAMPAIGNRewards:● 50 - 500 subscribers: 1 stake, per one post● 501 - 1000 subscribers: 2 stakes, per one post● 1001 - 5000 subscribers: 3 stakes, per one post● 5001 subscribers: 4 stakes per one postRules:● Must have at least 50 subscribers and make privacy settings open for your page● Must follow project Instagram account● Copy 1 posts from the official page Instagram account per day● Like all posts on the official page● Participants must use  #freenft #freenftmint #crypto #blockchain #airdrop #cryptocurrency #cryptoaidrop #bsc hashtags in every post● Multiple accounts registrations are not allowed, all related accounts will be checked and deleted● Please, post all the links to your work in this thread every day or every 3 days as a new post. Do not quote or edit your previous reportHow to join:  1. Join BNBSTEPS on social media:- Telegram- Twitter- Facebook- Instagram- TikTok2. Fill out the form:https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSea4OssN2IWmRhwmcdUCeIOEUOo1GmB7L94CbxhlAsyhxiIIw/viewformSPREADSHEET:https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1AL6WomVFC_Fs7l5qgVRnrDBKlJ4ZrU0OTinHaPUTcCk/edit?usp=sharing
